mgk:schema:export.description: Exports sobject schema to various formats

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

format.name: format
format.description: the format of the export (xls, csv)

sobjects.name: sobjects
sobjects.description: the named sobjects to be included in the export - default is all custom and standard objects are exported

customobjectsonly.name: customobjectsonly
customobjectsonly.description: limit the report to custom objects
